website_summaries.verdict: Highly protective and well padded, this case will keep your laptop safe in a fall.
pros: Stiff foam interior with air pockets offer shock absorption
Neoprene exterior brings water resistance for all-around protection
cons: It's a little bulky if you're looking for something to carry in a bag or backpack

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this case for my new Mac book 12 inch, it fits perfectly, and protects my laptop. I would recommend this case to someone else
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the MacBook 12"
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is literally everything I want in a case. Slim and sleek but functional. Way thinner than the tomtoc case I originally purchased. I love how it's a soft shell case but the material on the inside is firm. The pocket is big enough for me to fit my charger and usbc hub plus extra. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Le

customer_reviews.title: Nice case! But size was INACCURATE!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted this case to work, as it is very nicely padded with the bubbles inside and zips very smoothly. It looks sleek, and I love the outer zip pocket. For this I give it 2 stars. BUT the description was totally inaccurate!!! I ordered the 12-inch case because the dimensions in the listing said: 'EXTERIOR 12 x 8.7 x 0.8 inch and INTERIOR 11.5 x 8 x 0.7 inch'. NOT TRUE!!! My 11.5 x 8" notebook did not fit by about .5". The ACTUAL INTERIOR MEASUREMENTS ARE (and I measured them): 11 x 7.5". If this listing had actually been accurate, then it would have fit. Now unfortunately I have to return it. Hope they fix their listing!
customer_reviews.author: HummingbirdsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: This case is by far the best laptop case I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This case is by far the best laptop case I've ever had. I had a water bottle accident where it spilled all inside my backpack. My case was wet on the outside, but inside nothing was damaged! Not the inside of the case or, more importantly, my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Runetz Neoprene Laptop Sleeve a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new MacBook Pro and needed a case for my original 15" machine - this neoprene option from Runetz looked attractive, sturdy and was a great price, and I chose it among a host of other options. Product arrived quickly and it's a perfect fit for my computer! Has nice front zip compartment and excellent padding on the interior. The Runetz Neoprene Laptop Sleeve is a winner and I recommend it if you are looking for an economical yet quality solution.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: great for 13.3" laptop
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this sleeve for my HP Spectre x360 13.3" so far I am really happy with my purchase. it properly fits my laptop. the inside is padded well and the front pocket fits my charger, earbuds and stylus pen well. although I love the color, I know that it will get dirty easily but its the only color I liked. the zippers work great. so far no complaints
customer_reviews.author: nataly

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke at 1st use!
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke immediately. Unfortunately I am so busy that I couldn't check the return order in time before that window closed which was 4/13/19. I like the padded pouch. It is great for my MAC BOOK PRO 2019 15", but it is extremely annoying to have no working zippered pouch. I hate to spend the money again on a defective item. If someone from customer service or the company would like to contact me for an exchange, I will gladly amend my review.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$!! Definitely recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.text: First I want to say the package was delivered in great condition within a perfect fitting box. The material feels 10 out of 10, the zippers work smoothly, the outer pocket is a great size for little accessories or even your iPhone. The shipping was nice & quick, came within the next day. This product is definitely worth the $$$. Another thing, if you're the kind of person who protects your MacBook Pro 13" retina as much as possible, well this sleeve works perfect with a Rubberized shell case, fits snug and zips easily! More than Satisfied with my order! 👍🏼 p.s the color is even more amazing in person!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Not a terrible case, but the accessory pocket zipper was sewed on unevenly and would instantly come apart if you try to zip it. Main zipper was much more solid and didn't seem likely to have issues. Padding was good but seemed a little weak on the corners. Didn't seem like I would trust it to take a hard fall with my 15" MacBook Pro. I'll return and spend some more, you get what you pay for. To be fair to the seller, I recognize I most likely just got a lemon and my issue is not typical.
customer_reviews.author: amazonoptimusprime

customer_reviews.title: All-Around Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The case is exactly as describes and fits my 13" MacBook Air perfectly. I ordered this case to replace the case I had since the zipper broke. I really like this case and would recommend it to others. The navy and pink colors are true to the photo. I paid for two-day shipping and it arrived right on time. I am very pleased with this company and would buy from them again. I have attached photos of the case and of how my laptop fits inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Powell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This came so fast. Just in time for me to use it on my gig tonight!!! It fits my new MacBook perfectly. It’s defenitely worth the money. Super great quality and durability, I recommend this if you’re like me and will be traveling often with your MacBook or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very good computer sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to protect my brand new Dell 15 XPS on a yachting vacation. The Dell case had a lot of reviews that said the zipper scratched the computer. So I turned to Amazon and read a bunch of reviews. This cover earned great reviews. I am very pleased with the case. It protected my computer and functioned very well, it is well padded and has padding between the zipper and the computer. I would buy again, but I don’t think I will need one for many years.
customer_reviews.author: John Osborne

customer_reviews.title: The zipper on the small outer pocket was defective on the unit I received
customer_reviews.text: Other than the one cheap/defective zipper on the small outer accessory pocket the overall quality of the sleeve seems good, and the other zippers seem a bit more robust. The sleeve might be a bit oversized for the 15 Macbook Pro I purchased it for, but still a decent case. I decided to just leave the outer pocket open and not return the sleeve as defective... mostly due to me not wanting to wait for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Twistytex

customer_reviews.title: an internal cloth covering nicely seals the between your laptop and the zipper when ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is simple in design and works well. The zippers are small sized so use them with some care. To prevent damage to the finish on your laptop, an internal cloth covering nicely seals the between your laptop and the zipper when closed. The zippered pocket easily holds my charger, cable and USB-C accessory hub. This size holds my 13-inch 2018 MacBook Pro perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd V.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy front pocket & cushiony protection !
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I use it with an ASUS Chromebook 12.5. I love the roominess in the front pocket, see pictures! Finally I love the lime green/grey combo On a side note as others say, the little side zipper *is* tight* but it hasn't broke or anything.
customer_reviews.author: WhippetRun

customer_reviews.title: Great case, different color in real life.
customer_reviews.text: While it's a great case, I only rated it 4 stars because the color of the actual case differs from the picture. In the picture it looks like white and gray. When I received it, the white is a very off-white, almost canvas color. It just doesn't look like the picture. I'll keep it because it's still a great case, but I wish it looked just like the picture. Attached is a picture of the case next to a sheet of white computer paper.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Fits 15" MacBook Pro (mid 2014) perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 15" Chevron sleeve and it fits my 15" MacBook Pro perfectly. There is a little extra room to prevent the zipper from scraping against the computer. The egg-crate foam seems pretty protective. I like the pocket, big enough to fit a mouse and adapter. Seems like a really well made sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: @billiter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my laptop in my bag going to school everyday would get so dirty with pencil marks and who knows what else. I was so excited when it arrived. It's basically like a lunchbox material, maybe water absorbent (idk, don't take my word). But its very cute and has a lot of storage space. My macbook pro 13" fits well with room to spare. Plus the outside zipper pocket is good for my chargers and random school notes I get throughout the day. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Madison B.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, protects (I keep mine in my book bag for school) I didn’t realize that the slippers go all the way down so you can open it up and it will lay flat open. But seems to work well, no complaints here. Some people complain about not picky things, but it’s worth the buy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bull PT Gear

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase to protect your computer investment.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product. The sleeve is bigger than my 15 inch MacBook Pro a little and that’s ok. I can have the dongle accessory plugged into the machine during short trips if I want. The pouch for holding the cords and charger is just right. The zippers and material are of good quality it seems. There is a cushioning system of spongy shock absorbing bumps that the computer rests against when in the sleeve. I’m happy with the purchase and people have complimented the looks of the case.
customer_reviews.author: jwd

customer_reviews.title: This is the best laptop case EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love this MacBook Pro case! Use it whenever I take my laptop anywhere. I love the little pockets in it, so you can put your mouse, charger, or phone in it. It protects my computer a lot! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits my new MacBook perfectly, and the zippered side pocket holds my charger and extra cords. It's a light beige and grey chevron pattern, but I'm okay with that. The picture makes it look more white and gray. Overall, I'm very happy with the case & protection it provides.
customer_reviews.author: bboopnphx

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop sleeve!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sleeve for my MacBook Air. Great quality and zippers zip smoothly making it super easy to take out your laptop and storing it too. Only tiny issue I had was the very strong smell upon arrival, but it went away overnight after airing it out. Other than that, this is a solid product and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit like a glove...
customer_reviews.text: Holding up pretty well so far. Not an exact fit for the 15.4” which raises concern about the “shock-proof” features that are advertised. This is the 3rd case I’m trying out though, and so far so good. Think I’m keeping this one.
customer_reviews.author: tickt0ck

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeve, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve is even better in person! It is very slim fitting, and the paneling on the inside holds my MacBook in place! My MacBook also fits inside the sleeve with a hardcover case on it. The outside pocket also holds the power cord with no issue! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a visually appealing sleeve without the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole32

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to transport my laptop from work to home and wherever else I may bring it. It fits everything I bring with; my laptop, charger, magic mouse, jabra earbuds, and iPhone charger. The only problem I have faced is that since I carry so much in the smaller pocket that if I close my laptop first the smaller zipper doesn’t close all the way. It leaves a small opening near the end but it’s a simple fix to just zip that pocket up first and then the laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is exactly as pictured and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is exactly as pictured and the color is beautiful! Keeps my macbook safe and sound! It did smell funny at first, but that went away after about two days. I would give it more than five stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Good look. Bad zipper in the pocket. The Zipped Accessory Pocket comes with a very weak zipper and in my case, it came broken. The outer neoprene is very slippery and since these laptops are very heavy it tends to slip a lot and can easily fall off. In the past, I have had other neoprene covers much more adherent to the hand than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Protects my laptop perfectly. The material is nice and waterproof. The pocket is a bit small. I mean my mac charger does fit in the pocket but I have to force it. Otherwise everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jimena

customer_reviews.title: slicker than owl sh**
customer_reviews.text: love the color and contrast. like the handy pocket in the front. the egg crate style padding seems like it would be effective - which it better be because this is the slipperiest case i have ever seen in my life. i have nearly dropped the entire thing multiple times because it is so hard to get a decent grip on. perhaps i can mod it with a few drops of silicone grip dots or the like ...
customer_reviews.author: opeia

customer_reviews.title: Protects my macbook well. I've had this for years ...
customer_reviews.text: Protects my macbook well. I've had this for years and I've thrown my backpack around with this in it. No damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: flimsy side zipper, side pocket smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and main space for this laptop case, but I chose this one specifically because of the side pocket to store cords and chargers. (Not many cases have a side pocket). The pocket itself was smaller than my last laptop case, but I could still store items there. I was surprised to see the zipper seemed flimsier than the zipper used to close the laptop case. Within two weeks of owning this case, the zipper on the side pocket broke. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Scribble

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well made and a good fit. Pocket is big enough to hold charger with a little room to spare. I like the fact that the zipper goes all the way around 3 sides, so you can open a little spot to plug in usb-c charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: RClopp

customer_reviews.title: Absolute TRASH! Zipper broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, it looks nice. Nice padding inside. Zipper on the side pocket failed the FIRST time I zipped it. It is past the return period, so I have to eat this one. Lesson learned? Test all items, second you get them delivered.
customer_reviews.author: N9SSU

customer_reviews.title: Good buy - Had Mine Almost 4 Years
customer_reviews.text: I take this neoprene sleeve for granted. Bought it for extra protection while commuting, on vacation and business trips. Perfect fit for a MacBookPro. Slides in easily. Has held up really well despite a lot of use. Never tried cleaning it 'cause it still looks okay. Almost new. I like the outside pocket for occasional use, the few times something important is on paper and not on my laptop! The zippers work smoothly. Dependable. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Is Junk
customer_reviews.text: Had the sleeve for two weeks, used it twice, and the front (accessory pocket) zipper broke. I could tell as soon as I got it that it was not very high quality. The zipper would barely function and felt like you had to brace the fabric every time you wanted to zip/unzip the pocket. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your power book pro
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it’s perfect size, and the extra compartment for accessories makes this perfect for the Mac Poeer book pro 15 inch
customer_reviews.author: Allen Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Little bigger than I thought...
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, it's a bit longer than I thought, but blame me for that and not the seller--I liked the appearance and design of this sleeve so much I just ordered it without really reading the description. I'm very happy with it and will probably buy more in different colours.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: My MacBook Air seems to like it. I don’t carry my laptop around with me everywhere so I can’t speak to how the case would stand up to being banged up but it serves my purposes well. The charger pocket could be a little roomier, that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Super Neoprene Sleeve!
customer_reviews.text: After buying the new 12" MacBook with retina display, this was the first neoprene sleeve I could find that was specifically made for that new laptop. Not even the Apple Store had a sleeve to fit their new laptop. I was a bit skeptical upon finding the Runetz on Amazon as the price seemed ridiculously low. Imagine my surprise when it turned out be of better quality than any of the numerous neoprene sleeves I have bought for my other laptops over the years. Moreover, shipping was amazingly fast. I can highly recommend the Runetz for the new MacBook.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Eddy

customer_reviews.title: The zipper allows you to take your notebook out from the short side
customer_reviews.text: The zipper allows you to take your notebook out from the short side. I carry my computer in a cinch pack. I can take my computer out without removing the case from the pack. The zipper goes from corner to opposite corner and beyond. It looks elegant and is very protective.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my iPad Pro because I wanted something to keep it in that had a pocket for me to also store my Apple Pencil in when I'm not using them. My iPad Pro has a Speck case on it and fits perfectly inside this sleeve. My only compliant is that I though it was going to be white and gray. It's actually an off-white and gray. It's still a cute and functional sleeve though, and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: marissa m

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for an 11" laptop (not a MacBook), and it fits perfectly. It's well cushioned and made from good quality materials. An excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Flack53

customer_reviews.title: Sleak laptop case that is high quality
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect size for my MacBook Pro. I bought this just as a protection when sliding my laptop in and out of my school bag. I can also fit my MacBook charger in the side zipper portion with my MacBook in the case as well. Very high quality product. The only thing I don't not like is that the inside of the case is not very spongy/protective. Although it may look soft, the inside is very thin and offers little cushion if you were to drop this with you laptop in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case & Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a friend who needed one for his MacBook Pro. He's a professional photographer and tells me the case is perfect. He appreciates how it protects his laptop and how big the accessory pocket is. Now I'm going to order one for me!
customer_reviews.author: earthwhile

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the right size
customer_reviews.text: the article is very quality, simple and has very cool colors, but it runs large, I have a macbook pro 2017 of 13 " and I bought the case of 13" also and it looks big so much, that the computer is not stable inside moves to all sides and this can cause you to shock when entering it!
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Great case, great price, great happiness
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my computer case. I have a 13 in Mac Air which fits perfectly. The case is well padded. I love the zippered outside pocket which holds the mouse & cords. The case has a zipper pull at each end for added convienence. I use this every day to carry my computer to work. I have been using this for about a month & it looks like new. The price is great. I looked at computer cases at Best Buy & Apple &Target and none could compare to this price, and selection. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: EasyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Protective and fashionable !
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve is exactly what the item description is telling you. It is very protective, it fits my MacBook Air perfectly with or without a hardcover case on it and its super cute. I love that you can open the case completely wide and the pink on the inside really is an eye catcher. the pockets are a really sim fit, so putting a charger or phone or anything really makes it a little bulky, but for the price and protection It is nothing. love love love this case I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yascara Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good. a little bulgy after filling with power supply of macbook pro, as shown in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy carrying case for my MacBook made it easy to travel without fear of damaging my computer
customer_reviews.text: This purchase started off on a positive note. Snazzy carrying case for my MacBook made it easy to travel without fear of damaging my computer. After a little more than a year, the zipper stopped working. This item was severely overpriced to begin with, and its life span seems to be inversely proportional to the amount that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for any 15" laptop.
customer_reviews.text: A great case for 15" laptops, very protective with a very useful zippered pocket. Love the grey with lime green zipper. Actually purchased this sleeve when the Tucano microfiber sleeves were discntinued and very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: dadogg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best multifunction sleeve for Mac 12" with all my charging devices of iphone and samsung devices and the Mac charger
customer_reviews.author: Munther

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product more than 5 stars I would! My laptop fits perfectly inside, I even have a cover on it and I'm always throwing extra papers on top of my laptop in the sleeve. I love that it opens up completely so I never really have to take my laptop out of the sleeve and the pocket fits my laptop charger, phone charger, and a usb with more than enough room to spare. I could probably fit a mouse in there too! I love being able to have everything I need in one place so I don't have to be worrying about any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlyn D

customer_reviews.title: Does thew job
customer_reviews.text: Nicely padded, not to bulky. Front pocket really not helpful, but useful for small very flat items.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa from Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Sleeve!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 13-inch sleeve for my Lenovo X1 Yoga laptop. It fits perfectly and does not slide around. The dimensions of my laptop are 13" by 9". The side padding is sturdy and the raised nubs seem as if they will keep my laptop protected.
customer_reviews.author: tx2va14

customer_reviews.title: Works well with MSI Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Fits my MSI GS 65 Stealth. Only a small amount of extra room around the edges. I particularly like the little foam padding nubs on the inside of the sleeve. I would recommend this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Quality Quality Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the quality of this laptop sleeve. The color is rich and pretty and the zippers are smooth. Inside the egg crate look of interior will definitely protect your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: hilda cambric

customer_reviews.title: Great for 16” MacBook Pro with bulky hard shell case
customer_reviews.text: Great soft case for my 2019 16” MacBook Pro. I was a little concerned the case would be too small considering I have a large hard shell case too. Fit perfectly! I don’t struggle zipping it with the hard case on. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I so love it! Worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: This case is only worth $19 but the quality is like worth $150! I'm so loving it! You guys should buy! I have been using it for 9 months and there's no tear or faded color. ''
customer_reviews.author: IonCee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit Lenovo Thinkpad
customer_reviews.text: I measured my laptop three times to make sure it would fit and it didn't (by about 3/4"). Unfortunately I was past the return window, so I'll probably use it for travel with other electronics like chargers and tablets. I like the color (teal) and the slimness of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid Out of Water

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this sleeve case for my MacBook! The color is spot on. Mine is a lovely shade of green. I was skeptical about the mouse and charger actually fitting in the case while the computer is in it also, as the sleeve is so slim. No worries, they all fit perfectly. It protects from bumps and scratches nicely while traveling or even just stowing away at home. Spending that much on a computer, you tend to notice EVERY time something touches it. Speaking of price, the price of this product was great. Quality, attractive, great price, decent shipping time, satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped my laptop in this case multiple times and it's been fine! Also, I carry my laptop in a bookbag which I carelessly throw around, and this case protects it. Additionally, I love the pocket, as I easily store my charger in it (which keeps my charger nice and clean.) Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This case is great for the price. It fits my mackbook air perfectly. The pockets are nice to put additional things you may need for your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla O'D

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeve!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sleeve is sturdy and holds your laptop in place definitely one of the best things I purchased plus comes with a side pocket for storing accessories
customer_reviews.author: Abstract Bray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I love the sleeve. It is just I had hoped it would be. Looking back, I really wanted this color, but the light gray will show dirt and grime more than something darker. If I can find a decent way to clean it up, it would be awesome, otherwise, it was cheap enough that I can get another when the time comes. The sleeve, the zippers and all seem to be very well made, nothing about it suggests anything less than quality merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Ed's Eco Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, but it looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Macbook pro retina 13". When I first opened it I was really satisfied with the overall look of it, but I wasn't impressed with the quality. I thought the inside would've been softer and had more cushioning. Instead the bumps inside are more stiff than anything. My macbook tends to slide around a little in it, but not at a bother. I wouldn't count on this to provide a lot of shock absorption if you were to drop it. For the price it gets the job done by allowing you to carry your laptop to school, work or at a friend's place with less bulk and in style.
customer_reviews.author: Tashard

customer_reviews.title: A little off
customer_reviews.text: Wrong color. In the photograph it looked a great modern white and grey but it is beige and grey... very dull looking but great case. Returned it and got the turquoise one. My dough tee loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Plantfreak

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a really decent case. The inside is made up of gel Lord forbid I would ever drop it. There is storage on the front which comes in handy. If there was one thing I wanted different it would be a strap to carry it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value, strong and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection for my 10.5" Samsung Galaxy Tab A. Strong, good looking. The zippers are nice and easy to operate. I am using this pouch in the African hot and humid conditions and it is a beauty to have. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Joy King

customer_reviews.title: Massive zipper issues
customer_reviews.text: I'd really wanted to love this sleeve. The material is nice, the design is nice, the padding is nice but the zippers used on this suck. The first sleeve I got, came already with a broken zipper. The replacement was shipped immediately. Today I realized that the outside zipper is broken AGAIN. Hardly used that one at all. It's sad to see such a great product suffer from such a poor quality zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Sourcesoldier

customer_reviews.title: Not as snug as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Does the job overall but there is about an inch of room for my Macbook Pro 16 to slide around when the case is closed. Also, make sure that the zippers on the inside, being metal, are not scratching the sides of your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: iUser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Case!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sleeve for my Macbook Air 13". The quality is unbelievable for the price and the colors are amazing, I got the navy and pink one. The inside is like an egg crate so provides a lot of protection for my computer. This sleeve fits my mac perfectly and I love that it zips all the way around so I won't scratch my mac. I looked at a lot of sleeves and so glad I went with this one. Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: blondie

customer_reviews.title: I was searching for a long time for a good sturdy laptop cover for my new macbook and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a long time for a good sturdy laptop cover for my new macbook and I came across this and I researched it and saw that it had good reviews. I was kinda skeptical because I didn't want to pay almost 20 bucks for it but I decided to give it a try. Well I got here and I absolutely love it! I have had it for nearly 3 months already and I have no problems with it so far! It even holds my macbook with a hard case on it and it has plenty of room in the front pocket. I cant complain at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zane M.

customer_reviews.title: Accessory zipper broke first week
customer_reviews.text: Zipper peeled open first week. Case lost its shape over the next few months. I travel extensively and the case has not held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Staber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 12” MacBook
customer_reviews.text: Fits my rose gold MacBook perfectly even with a case on it. It provides good drop protection and holds a lot of accessories without being too bulky. I have my charger, air pods and usb c hub plus a small notebook and pencil. I only wish it had a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki J

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work for my 11.5" Surface
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something sleek for my new Surface and this is not it. Had to struggle to close...and not enough padding for corners. I sent it back. Maybe great for others with other computers...but not the small Microsoft Surface.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Hartleb

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop Sleeve I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this case was because it had a pocket to store my charger while a lot of others I looked at did not. However, upon receiving the product it turned out to be made of high quality materials and looks great too. Additionally, it has small bumps of padding on the inside for greater shock protection. You can't go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Airsoftguy97

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, functional case
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a case for my MacBook that would maintain the laptop’s small, slim size while protecting it in my purse. This case does just that and is a very pretty color. It also has a front pocket in which I can easily store a few adapters.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great case for MacBook Pro.
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to ordering case for my Macbook Pro. Looked through options and settled on this due to exterior pocket for chargers and nice gray and green color combination. Pleasantly surprised by quality. Thicker than I was expecting with textured interior surface. Zipper goes all the way around so case will lay flat when opened fully which is nice. Computer fits nicely and does not slide inside. The exterior zipper is hidden with a low profile. My charger, cords and a few extras can fit in well and still appear fairly flat. Very happy with this case. Much better quality compared to similar priced cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but the zipper broke after extensive use
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve fit the computer and served its purpose for a while. The zipper track has since started to come undone so now I have to leave a little bit of room when zipping it shut otherwise I cannot get the sleeve open again. The front pocket on the sleeve is really nice for storing USB hubs, flash drives, etc. If the product was a little more durable, it would receive 5 stars. That being said, I used it multiple times every day for over a year before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More padding/support than others
customer_reviews.text: This item is substantial and sturdier than many of the simple neoprene sleeves. The pocket is big enough to hold the power adapter/chord, some flash drives, an adapter, a slide advancer, and a Halo backup power source. It is slightly larger than it needs to be for a MacBook Pro, but this is fine with me. I also like the fact that the zippers go fully around 3 sides, which make it much easier to get out quickly. The color is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective zippers. Too big for MacBook Pro 15!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is junk and defective. No where near the right size. Too big MacBook Pro shuffles around inside. Outside zipper is terrible completely failed. I put in return with amazon while I was out of town and then when I got back they said I was too late to return. Product is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This sleeve fits my 2016 Macbook Pro (15") super well. The side pocket is also great for ...
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve fits my 2016 Macbook Pro (15") super well. The side pocket is also great for my power adapter and cable. I'd say the only thing I sometimes miss is having a shoulder strap on it. But, not enough to NOT purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover/case. It's padded on the inside so I feel comfortable that my expensive item is protected and it has a pocket for accessories, which was important to me. Everything I wanted in a reasonable price too. The only thing that would make it better is if it had handles or a carry strap to carry it, but that's minor and I'm sure I could have found that in something else if I kept looking but this hit nearly all requirements so I went with it and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: mrswoody

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for my MacBook Pro and the front pouch zipper wasn't tracking properly, so it wouldn't close. Exchanged it for another one, and the replacement has the EXACT same problem. The front pouch zipper doesn't work. Poorly built.
customer_reviews.author: K. B.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This feels thinner and cheaper than it looks pictured. I ended up leaving the foam that it ships with inside of the sleeve just to provide more protection. The pictures also make it seem like it opens more from the top than it does - it still opens from the top, but pulling the laptop out from the top isn't always the easiest. The product also still smells like bad chemicals weeks after it arrived. I do not enjoy that aspect of it. This sleeve fits my MacBook Air 13" well.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Geek

customer_reviews.title: Spilled coffee on it
customer_reviews.text: Spilled coffee on it and both the laptop and the case were fine! Just washed the case and it was good to go again. I've had it for over a year now and the zipper and everything works well!
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about this item??? I say go for it, you'll love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. It's stylish and functional and protects my laptop. Fits my Apple MacBook Pro with Retina display, which is in a hard shell case, like a glove. The side pocket is an awesome addition and allows me to carry the power cords for my MacBook and iPhone with ease! Just what I needed and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Zika

customer_reviews.title: 100%  Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s basically perfect for my MacBook, it’s quality is high and feels like it’ll last a long time. And also while looking cute, it is for sure gonna protect my laptop
customer_reviews.author: alicia feliz

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my friend as a gift and he loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend as a gift and he loves it. Very clean design, nice stretchy fabric, and soft padding inside. The outside pocket could be a bit roomier, but overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Knowgood

customer_reviews.title: Fits 13 inch 2018 MacBookPro perfectly
customer_reviews.text: has excellent padding and laptop doesn't move around in the case. Well designed and would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 2018 15" Macbook Pro...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, but if you are getting it to protect your 15" New Macbook Pro, it's just a bit too large. I had to return this product because my laptop slid around inside quite a bit. The quality seemed very nice, but the fit was not right.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product.  Peace of mind for me for my Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: My laptop is my life. I run my business, all of my work is done with my macbook pro. This case fits amazingly well. And offers a LOT of protection. I have already recommended this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Black

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I got a new laptop (Asus Zenbook UX305FA) recently and my old laptop case (used for my Lenovo IdeaPad U4100) was too big for it. I bought a few other cases that said they fit for 13 and 13.3 inch laptops and ultrabooks, but they were still too big for my laptop. This one, while it may be a bit wider for my laptop (there's some space after I put the laptop in), at least the length is just perfect for it and it's thick and seems sturdy enough to protect my 0.5inch high laptop.
customer_reviews.author: syazanazura

customer_reviews.title: Stylish; Well-Made; Great Padding; Would Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials and construction. Stylish. Way better padding and protection than standard neoprene sleeve. Can't imagine buying a standard neoprene sleeve for my expensive Macbook Pro if I have this as an option. Would highly recommend. The zippered outside pouch is a big plus - I don't like to put my recharging cord in the same compartment as my laptop/2-in-1/tablet
customer_reviews.author: Sam Brady

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t protect the corners
customer_reviews.text: Be careful carrying this around. There’s very little padding around the corners, and that’s where you’re most at risk of dropping it on. But the cable holding pocket holds two cables, a charging brick, and a dongle, which is what I bought this for.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleeve Yet!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to sleeves for my laptop, I bought and returned 4 cases before finding this one... From Thule (both Gauntlet and Stravan), Incase (both the Neoprene and Tensaerlite)... This case fits the best out of the 4; leaving less than 1/2-1/4 inch around the computer its self (I also have a hard shell of the computer). I love the micro fiber nubs on the inside of the case, I'm never worried about impact to the computer. The craftsmanship of the case is impeccable, it does not show wear and tear nor smears of dirt and dust. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a nice case, I wasn't sure when I bought it... it's good quality and slim and lightweight. I like it. Nice pocket too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Will fit MSI GS65
customer_reviews.text: For everyone wondering this sleeve will 100% fit the MSI GS65. It is actually such a perfect fit! Quality is quite good and also it is not to thick or thin of material. Really happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Mark David

customer_reviews.title: Great case !
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great case! The build quality is better than I expected. The outside pocket is very useful to store additional things such as cables, portable mouse, or a small charger. The pocket isn't huge so if you have big bulky charger, it won't fit. I have a 2015 Dell XPS 13, this sleeve is a little big for it so the laptop does move around inside more than I would like. The fit isn't snug but the laptop is amazingly tiny so I'm not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: AP

product_meta.title: Runetz MacBook Pro 15 inch Sleeve Neoprene Case for A1990, A1707, A1398 with Accessory Pocket Cover 2019 2018 2017 2016 Laptop Sleeve 15 inch, Black
feature_bullets: MACBOOK PRO 15 INCH SLEEVE ★ Best Design Neoprene Sleeve with Pocket for MacBook Pro 15 inch 2019 2018 2017 2016 2015 and other Laptop Computers: ThinkPad, Surface Book, Dell, Samsung Chromebook, HP, Lenovo, Sony and other (please check measurements)

MEASUREMENTS AND SIZES ★ EXTERIOR 15.5" x 11" x 1" inch and INTERIOR 14.8" x 10.5" x 0.8" inch. Your most valued MacBook Pro 15 inch deserves no less than the ultimate protection from scratching, scuffing a top-quality guarantee provided by Runetz

15 INCH LAPTOP SLEEVE ★ Made from Premium quality Neoprene, the Runetz 15 inch MacBook Sleeve is precision engineered to provide maximum protection for your precious 15 inch laptop computer while allowing a snug fit without adding any extra bulk

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL POCKET ★ More than just your ideal Apple MacBook Pro 15 inch Sleeve, this Runetz innovation comes with a Zipped Smart Accessory Pocket for organization and easy access to your charger, phone, cable, keys, wallet and other accessories

PREMIUM-QUALITY MACBOOK SLEEVE 15 INCH ★ Specially tailored to fit your MacBook Pro 15 inch == Compatible with Model A1990 and A1707 -- MR932LL/A, MR942LL/A, MLH32LL/A, MLW72LL/A, MLH42LL/A, MLW82LL/A ★ Model A1398 -- MJLQ2LL/A, MJLT2LL/A ★ Model A1286
